y year 
• 50% of pregnant women reported taking at least 
one medication 
• Pregnant women take an average of 2.6 
medications at  any time during pregnancy 
• First trimester use of prescription medications 
has increased by more than 60% 
• Use of 4 or more medications in the first 
trimester has tripled (9.9% to 27.6%) 
Mitchell AA, Gilboa SM, Werler MM, et al., Medication use during pregnancy, with particular focus on prescription drugs: 1976-
2008. Am J Obstet Gynecol. 2011;205(1):51.e1-8.
